name: Cranberry-Turkey Pinwheels
author: SunnyDaysNora
summary: These quick-and-easy turkey pinwheels are a great way to use up leftover cranberry sauce from Thanksgiving, or you can use store-bought cranberry sauce.
ingredients: 4 ounces thinly sliced Swiss cheese, chopped
2 ounces thinly sliced Granny Smith apple
directions: Combine cream cheese and cranberry sauce in a bowl
Spread 1/4 of the mixture across the surface of each tortilla, spreading all the way to the edges
Top each evenly with 1/4 of the sliced turkey, chopped Swiss cheese, and sliced apples
Roll tortillas up tightly and wrap in plastic wrap
Refrigerate rolled tortillas for at least 1 hour
Slice each chilled tortilla roll into 8 pieces before serving
